title: Monster High Doll and Fashion Set, Clawdeen Wolf with Dress-Up Locker and 19+ Surprises, Skulltimate Secrets
features: Biteology class just ended at Monster High and itâ€™s time for an after-ghoul outfit change! This Skulltimate Secrets Clawdeen Wolf doll comes with a creeperific locker and fashion surprises.
Can you creep a secret? Take the four keys and wash off their spooky black coating for a Color Reveal moment, then unlock all four matching compartments to discover hidden items stashed inside.
After the fearsomely fun unboxing, the coffin-shaped locker doubles as both a storytelling device and storage container for Clawdeen Wolf doll and all her clothing and surprises.
Clawdeen Wolf looks clawesome with crimped hair and fab-boo-lous fashions that encourage mix-and-match play -- all catered to her unique werewolf scaritage!
From bucket hats to post-casketball game snacks, Skulltimate Secrets comes with lots of pieces to spark imagination and style expression. Combine them in creative ways for 125+ looks!
Explore the whole Monster High collection of dolls and playsets for creepy-cute style and thrilling adventures with the whole boo-crew!
description: Monster High Skulltimate Secrets dolls offer a spooktacular unboxing experience with 19+ surprises that include fashions, surprises and themed pieces. Color Reveal technology and step-by-step unveiling add magic and mystery, while the coffin container is perfect for storytelling and storage. Each sold separately, subject to availability. Fully articulated. Doll cannot stand alone. Colors and decorations may vary.
